{{fr-adj}}

# {{lb|fr|colloquial}} completely [[deaf]]
#* {{quote-book
|fr
|author=w:Raymond Queneau
|publisher=Gallimard
|year=1959
|title=Zazie dans le métro
|passage=Dis donc, tata Marceline, dit Zazie, tu te fous de moi ou bien t’es vraiment '''sourdingue''' ?
|t="Hey, Auntie Marceline," said Zazie, "are you taking the piss, or are you '''completely deaf'''?"}}
types.html:
sourdingue (plural sourdingues)

  1. (colloquial) completely deaf
    • 1959, Raymond Queneau, Zazie dans le métro, Gallimard:
      Dis donc, tata Marceline, dit Zazie, tu te fous de moi ou bien t’es vraiment sourdingue ?
      "Hey, Auntie Marceline," said Zazie, "are you taking the piss, or are you completely deaf?"

title: sourdingue
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /suʁ.dɛ̃ɡ/
